scripts.start: if [ ! -d build ]; then npm run build:deploy; fi && parallelshell 'npm run serve' 'npm run watch'
scripts.build:js: if [ ! -d build/assets/javascript ]; then mkdir -p build/assets/javascript; fi && uglifyjs $npm_package_config_js_files -o build/assets/javascript/main.js --screw-ie8 --comments
scripts.build:css: postcss src/assets/css/style.css -o build/assets/css/style.css && purgecss --css build/assets/css/style.css --content build/*.html -o build/assets/css
scripts.build:images: npm run move:images && npm run build:images:webp && npm run build:images:other
scripts.build:deploy:light: npm run build:html && npm run test:js && npm run test:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run compress:js && npm run compress:css && npm run compress:html
scripts.build:deploy: npm run build:deploy:light && npm run build:images && npm run build:icons && npm run move:audio
scripts.watch: parallelshell 'npm run watch:js' 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:html'
scripts.watch:js: eye --*glob=src/assets/javascript/**/*.js npm run test:js and npm run build:js and npm run compress:js
scripts.watch:css: eye --*glob=src/assets/css/**/*.css npm run test:css and npm run build:css and npm run compress:css
scripts.watch:html: eye --*glob=src/**/*.html npm run build:html and npm run compress:html
